name: Dice: Dizzying & Inquisitive Conundrums to Explore
name_original: Dice: Dizzying & Inquisitive Conundrums to Explore
description:
MADE WITH @AdventurousJay: https://adventurous-jay.itch.io/

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to move
  • Land on a numbered tile with the corresponding die side facing upwards to activate it
  • Get to the end in the least amount of moves possible
  • Have fun!

WARNING: If using web version, highly recommend fullscreen
